pnr_q1.Description: If I suffer a serious wrong, I will take my revenge as soon as possible, no matter what the costs.

pnr_q2.Description: I am willing to invest time and effort to reciprocate an unfair action.

pnr_q3.Description: I am kind and nice if others behave well with me, otherwise it's tit-for-tat.

pnr_q4.Description: If somebody puts me in a difficult situation, I will do the same to him/her.

pnr_q5.Description: If somebody offends me, I will offend him/her back.

pnr_q6.Description: If someone is unfair to me, I prefer to give him/her what s/he deserves instead of accpeting his/her apologies.

pnr_q7.Description: I would not do a favor for somebody who behaved badly with me, even if it meant foregoing some personal gains.

pnr_q8.Description: If somebody is impolite to me, I become impolite.

pnr_q9.Description: The way I treat others depends much on how they treat me.
